description: This is the main index HTML file for a database visualizer web application. It constructs the user interface, including sidebar navigation for databases and tables, and a data view area. The embedded JavaScript manages dynamic content loading, user interactions such as database/table selection, data fetching from APIs, table rendering, and cell expansion for large or complex data values.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the server and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases, resetting selected states and loading indicator.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the list of tables for a selected database, and loads tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data for a selected table, with loading and error handling.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML for displaying table data, including handling wide content.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual table cell content, handling nulls, objects, and long strings.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for large or complex data, toggling full display.
